cab.content: PARAPHPASB T3L3CRAM from the Governor General of the Union of South Africa to the Secretary of State for the Colonies.(Received Colonial Office 31st August 1919 8,55.p,m.)31st AugustIn view especially of your telegram of 26th August and in view cf great urgency of matter cabinet decided subsequent to-General Botha1s death to pro-ce&d by resolution, introducing'later legislation giving effect to the (?Treaty).They expect that the resolution vrill be adoptedby the middle of next week.. , BIDCTOr. - . .
